instruction: Create a list of 10 helpful tips for designing an effective computer-based education system
output:
1. Make sure the learning platform is intuitive and user-friendly.
2. Provide students with simple on-boarding instructions to get started.
3. Design a course structure that meets the needs of the students.
4. Take advantage of automated assessment tools to measure learning outcomes.
5. Incorporate interactive elements such as polls, games, etc. to engage students. 
6. Incorporate visual and audio materials to enhance learning.
7. Use multimedia to present information in an engaging way.
8. Provide pertinent feedback and guidance to students.
9. Incorporate a variety of activities to suit different learning styles.
10. Integrate collaborative activities for team-building.
